title: Redline to Make Mutual
instruction: If this is a one-way NDA, redline it to make it a mutual NDA where both parties can share confidential information with the same protections. Ensure all obligations are reciprocal.

party1.name: NexGen Analytics Inc.
party1.address: 201 Mission Street, Suite 2400, San Francisco, CA 94105
